original_text: The people of Sheba and Dedan, and the traders and leaders of Tarshish will ask you questions. They will say, ‘Why have you brought all your armies together? Have you come to attack Israel and take away their valuable things for yourselves? Will you take away their silver and their gold? Will you take their animals and all their things? Will you carry away such a great load of things for yourselves? ’ ”
korean_text: 스바와 드단과 다시스의 상인과 그 부자들이 네게 이르기를 네가 탈취하러 왔느냐 네가 네 무리를 모아 노략하고자 하느냐 은과 금을 빼앗으며 짐승과 재물을 빼앗으며 물건을 크게 약탈하여 가고자 하느냐 하리라

sentences.original_text: The people of Sheba and Dedan
and the traders and leaders of Tarshish
Why have you brought all your armies together?
sentences.korean_translation: 어째서 너는 모든 네 군대를 모았는가?

sentences.original_text: Have you come to attack Israel
and take away their valuable things for yourselves?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 귀중한 것들을 빼앗기 위해 왔는가?

sentences.original_text: Will you take away their silver and their gold?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그들의 은과 금을 가져갈 것인가?

sentences.original_text: Will you take their animals and all their things?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 그들의 가축과 모든 물건들을 가져갈 것인가?

sentences.original_text: Will you carry away such a great load of things for yourselves?
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 너희를 위해 그렇게 큰 짐의 물건들을 운반할 것인가?
